title: Vegetable pad Thai
description: Feel free to omit the fish sauce and replace it with light soy sauce for a vegetarian pad Thai.
ingredients: 3 fresh red chillies (or green ones if you want a hotter dish)
3 tbsp fish sauce or light soy sauce
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
3 tbsp coarsely chopped roasted peanuts, for garnish
